content: * *Koh Eng Tian** [SC](/wiki/Senior_Counsel) was the first [Solicitor-General](/wiki/Solicitor-General) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). He was appointed to the post in 1981 until his retirement in December 1991. He was born in 1937 and was educated in [Victoria School](/wiki/Victoria_School) and the [University of Malaya](/wiki/University_of_Malaya) in Singapore. He was one of the first two [Senior Counsel](/wiki/Senior_Counsel) appointed in Singapore in 1989. This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This Asian law-related biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Koh Eng Tian
